about.title: About the Author
about.subtitle: Crafting Stories That Echo Beyond Pages
about.headerDesc: Award-winning author exploring the intricate landscapes of human relationships through contemporary literary fiction

background.label: Background
background.text1: Based in [City], I've spent the last decade weaving narratives that explore the complexities of modern relationships, cultural identity, and the search for belonging in an increasingly connected world.
background.text2: My work has been recognized by [Awards/Recognition], and my stories have appeared in [Publications]. I hold an MFA in Creative Writing from [University].

journey.title: Writing Journey
journey.subtitle: From First Draft to Final Page

process.title: Creative Process
process.desc: My stories often begin as small observations - a conversation overheard in a café, a forgotten photograph, or a memory that refuses to fade. Through careful crafting and numerous revisions, these seeds grow into fully realized narratives.

influences.title: Literary Influences
influences.desc: I draw inspiration from a diverse range of voices in contemporary literature, from the intricate character studies of Alice Munro to the bold narratives of Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie.

teaching.title: Teaching & Workshops
teaching.desc: Beyond writing, I'm passionate about nurturing new voices in literature. I conduct writing workshops and mentor emerging authors through various programs.
